column5: A while back there was a tread on rib recipes. How can I locate it.  Thanks
Easy as typing Rib recipe in the search window...  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...;hl=rib+recipes
http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=7925  I think 7925 is the topic you are looking for.
Doesn't look like it...but same link Dougal...now get back to work me lad !
WORK!!!!!!!!! I want to cook.  Thanks guys much appreciated
